website_summaries.verdict: You'll do great with them if you're not moving around too much while wearing them.
pros: Though these have a terrific sound, there's not a lot of bass
They're very comfortable to wear and pair up quickly
cons: The charging cable is short, and there can be a hissing sound when making the Bluetooth connection

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 13 year old who listens to music constantly. They are great sound and they block out the annoying sounds from his younger brother so he can enjoy his music. They fold up nice for going in his book ag while at school.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hertzig

customer_reviews.title: no midrange, yes white noise/distortion--don't bother with these unless you like to get stuff in the mail only to return it
customer_reviews.text: This headphone set has poor sound quality: it lacks midrange, and attempts to compensate by boosting treble and bass, but in a bad way. Mids are still scooped & music sounds poor & cheap. The hissing white noise is intolerable, unless you like white noise then these are perfect for your youtube noise videos. I tested these with (remastered) Led Zeppelin, Physical Graffiti, and Hillsong United, Zion. I would've also tested with Maxim Vengerov or a Rachmaninov concerto but didn't bother after listening to two albums. I'm not an expert but I am a musician with sound engineer experience.
customer_reviews.author: CXK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic head phones! They stay charged FOREVER! I had them fully charged and used them for an hour on average 6 times a week and did not need to charge them again for a month! The only complaints I have is when doing certain exercises they tend to slide off my head a little so I have to adjust them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Two Failures?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these on Aug 18. 2017. One failed in approximately 90 days and one in 110 days. Both outside the Amazon return window. Requested help (or at least sympathy..lol) from the shipper and received none. I do recognize that the shipper does not warrant the product; however, they normally have a better rapport with the manufacturer they represent. The units worked great until they both failed to pair with any of several devices they had been pairing with. This is the first negative review I can remember giving.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: $30 is CHEAP for five stars *glory hands*
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a month to write this review because I thought no way could these headphones actually be this good for the price. But I use them all day everyday and I have never been more impressed with headphones under >$50... I have sensitive ears with headphones and am super picky but these are so comfortable I can sleep in them. Noise reduction is great when something is playing, pretty crummy though when there's no audio. Fast charge, easy to pair Bluetooth or wire jack, play/pause and fwd/rwd buttons are handy. Overall definitely worth the buy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The Mic doesn't work properly. Others can barely hear my voice. Update 04/06/2017: Customer service did pretty good job and fast, by contacting me about the issue I had. They even re-order a new one for me, now everything is work perfect as I expected. Thank you and keep up the Good work.
customer_reviews.author: Ghabarkhaz

customer_reviews.title: Let me down
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be solid, awesome headphones but as of today they mysteriously stopped being able to charge and prematurely died on me at work after showing half battery life 10 min prior. Had high hopes for these headphones as my job is very physical, hands on, up to 12 hour shifts but very disappointed now. Shows no red light indicating charging with multiple chargers on different outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Mom and Teen approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for our 19 year old son who keeps either breaking the headphones or they crap out on him after a few months. He LOVES the bluetooth and that they are over the ear.....as do I. They fold up as well, although he hardly ever takes the time to do so during the few hours that he actually doesn't have them on. One of the main reasons I purchased this kind had to do with wanting him not to have them shoved INSIDE his ears for these long periods of time. So...win/win here! They seem to be holding up to him so far which says a lot actually lol. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: My ARTasticSelfTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: 4-Month Old Headphones, Inconsistent Sound in Right Ear
customer_reviews.text: It's been 4 months since I bought these headphones, and the sound in the right ear has recently started going in and out. I have to maneuver the wiring with tape on the left side in order to KEEP the sound in the right ear. My headphones always go out in one ear eventually, but never THIS quickly. October 2018 EDIT: I was sent another pair for free shortly after posting my initial review, but these too are acting up. If the wire gets moved (whenever I move my head in any direction), it can result in static, the sound coming out in only one ear, or silence. Going to have to purchase a different pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Diva380

customer_reviews.title: They are a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are cheaply made. The first pair I bought, the button to turn them on and off stopped working within the first week. This time around it has stopped working again, and I have had them for about 2 months so I'm unable to return them. They are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brent and Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple of months. Now battery stopped charging. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: BCONN

customer_reviews.title: Wireless connection to phone lasted two months. Now nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Wireless connection to phone lasted two months. Now nothing. Can still use it with a cord, but that's not why I bought cordless headphones. And after about six weeks, the signal became very spotty, so I didn't even get two months full use out of them. UPDATE: Replacement sent- just another piece of junk which cuts out constantly and requires the use of the cord attachment, rendering them worthless as a replacement for earbuds. I can imagine that the whole thing will cut out in a few more weeks, just like the first set. You get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Jamele

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. While the material and feel are pretty good, in addition to how they look and the long battery life, head phones are supposed to do one thing and they should do it well. These head phones fail in audio quality. The audio quality on these head phones is horrendous (so bad that after having them for a week I’ve bought another headset of a different brand). This is unfortunate as I have had luck with mpow brand in the past. Listening to music on these head phones is like listening to it through a tin can. Lacks richness and depth. Would not recommend these head phones.
customer_reviews.author: porte8a2

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: best for the price. great fit and sound. no need to spend lots on bose or beats. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 months after I bought my first pair of headphones the fabric that covers the headband cushion started to come off. Customer service reached out to me after I posted a review on Amazon and sent me a new pair. Now, after 9 months, the second pair is showing the same issue (see photo). I am sure that a pair headphones should last longer that 5-9 months.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lema

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: I'VE USED THESE EVERYDAY SINCE i BOUGHT THE. i HAVE SYNCED THEM TO MY PHONE AND MY LAP TOP ITS WONDERFUL TO HAVE CORD FREE CONNECTION. I'M SERIOUSLY GOING TO BUY SOME FOR THE GRANDKIDS FOR CHRISTMAS. ONLY THING I WOULD COMPLAIN ABOUT WOULD BE AFTER A FEW MINUTES I HAVE TO PULL THEM AWAY FROM MY EARS BECAUSE THEY START GETTING A LITTLE IRRITATED AROUND THE LOBE AREA. BUT THE PRICE IS PERFECT. FAST SHIPPING AND LIGHT WEIGHT. GREAT SOUND QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: aquahoma

customer_reviews.title: Customer service superb....
customer_reviews.text: Broke after just four months Poor Mechanical Design... Okay they sent me a replacement free of charge... I have no other recourse but to give them 5 stars for customer service....it may have been just a fluke that they broke the first time... thank you Mpow Buy the way the sound quality is real good...
customer_reviews.author: z2d2dom

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t the same quality of my previous MPow 059’s
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these headphones, I liked the first pair so much (apparently so did someone else) that after they were stolen from my car, I simply had to buy another set. Sadly, these are nowhere near the headphones I purchased prior, the sound is almost inaudible unless the volume is turned all the way up. The sound is very hollow sounding also. I’m hoping I simply received a defective set of headphones this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is awful!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews most were quite positive. Even some saying they fit a big head. I'm returning them after one night. They went over my ears just fine but they squeezed my head too tight. I have a large head 7+ size for fitted hats. I wasn't expecting anything amazing but the sound quality was awful. Not sure if there were settings but I was in a voice chat client and i could hardly understand anything people were saying. My wife listened to them as well to make sure it want just me, she completely agreed that they are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Of Sharon Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These replaced headphones that were four years old and the technology has improved greatly in that time. It takes less than three seconds for the headphones to connect to my PC, phone or table. The design of the controls is excellent. There is one thing to caution you about with these phones: the sound is bright. If you love Klipsch and B&W stereo speakers (and I do), you'll love these headphones. My wife is more of a fan of Bose speakers, and she prefers to dampen the sound on her phone or tablet when she uses them. (We actually have two pairs: pink for her, silver for me.) I endorse these phone 100%. My beautiful wife grades them at 92%.
customer_reviews.author: W. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Keep on movin
customer_reviews.text: Terrible sound quality. Very heavy on my head and made my ears sweat. For them to be so big, the sound is terrible. 7-13-20- company sent another pair of headphones to my surprise which was great. I believe they are an updated version because there is a switch on them to amplify the sound. The sound quality is somewhat better but again, they are heavy on MY head. I can't run with these on because they aren't comfortable. I believe this is why more people wear earbuds. I just want sound and not a large contraption on my head. I assumed larger headphones=better sound, but this is not the case. Customer service appears great thoughm
customer_reviews.author: M McLendon

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE-just received a new pair in the mail. I didn't ask for a new pair. I assume the company is sending them for me to try again. I must have got a busted set. I have no thad a chance to try the new ones. But nice customer service! Pure junk! They don’t work!!! I have a very sad little girl. This was a Christmas present. The sounds comes out muffled and staticky. How is that possible?! Anyway... save yourself time, money, and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Trostel

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is an edit, I realized it was my phone setting, not volume for headphones. Received the product on time, nicely packaged. The headphones feel "cheap", but are user friendly. They feel a bit heavy after an hour or so, the hunt for the perfect lightweight headphone continues. These are okay though.
customer_reviews.author: sandra miller

customer_reviews.title: look and fit good, horrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: There was a 1 star review that stated "very poor mid-range" I should have listened. Far too much base, almost no mid-range at all, almost sounds muffled. In some cases the sound was intermittent no matter which device I paired it with, my phone, blue tooth speakers or my computer. My $5 ear buds sound far superior. Update: After I submitted my review and returned the headphones, I was contacted by the seller and without any provocation by me, they sent me new headphones. The model was different (BH142A the lightweight version) but the sound is far superior. I am still leaving the one star but I will review the new ones that I received. Their customer service is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So these were pretty good at first. But all of a sudden my headset stopped working. It will charge, but I can't connect to my phone anymore or to any other devices. It also sucks that they stopped working 2 days after the 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Yes, everyone will hear you!
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and will be returning asap. Pros: Fast shipping and they are cute and comfortable and do not slide on my tiny child sized head. Pairing them to my cellphone was also easy. Cons:These headphones are obnoxiously loud and even on the low settings everyone can hear what I'm listening to. There is practically no base and even an equalizer doesn't boost sound quality. I've had better results from my Walmart $20 headphones. I'll pay an extra $30 for noise cancelation and better base. I was excited to receive these with the fast shipping but am over all unimpressed by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: bnrorie

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these in September 2018 and they totally stopped working and died less than a year later. As they were still under the manufacturer's warranty, I contacted them, they were excellent and sent me a new pair right away. My second pair died after around 6 months. Same thing: won't power on, won't take a charge. They're comfortable and they sound nice while they work, but I will not be spending money on another pair of Mpow headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Waid

customer_reviews.title: Okay but have issues
customer_reviews.text: First: for a product that many people will use as a night time way to watch shows, please make a way to turn the LED on the side off, or at least make it less bright. Sound quality is less than other similarly priced BT phones I've used. I do like that they completely encapsulate the ear. Somewhat comfortable but more padding up top would be really nice. Bass response 3/10. All sound including bass is slightly ill defined. For what I paid, I am not sad. Just they have a lot of things they could improve and I'd pay twice as much if they did.
customer_reviews.author: J Perugini

customer_reviews.title: I bought three pairs, something wrong with all of them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pairs of these headphones, a pair for me and a pair for each of my teen sons. Mine are two months old and completely stopped connecting to anything. The other two pairs were purchased three months ago and the black foam is falling apart on one pair and one side of the headphones have stopped working on the other. $100 down the drain. They worked great for the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair for each of my sons (14 and 12). They are very happy with them. I like that they can connect via Bluetooth or corded since they aren’t always great at remembering to charge things. My younger son is some what sensitive to noise and he wears his even when they are off to dampen the noise around him. I was prompted to do this review when I made a warranty claim due to one pair not charging anymore, but they are well in the warranty period, so hopefully there will be no issue. I will update my review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Why are the prompts so loud?
customer_reviews.text: They are great! Amazing for studying and blocking people out. Sound volume is appropriate and people can’t hear it when you’re wearing them. HOWEVER- the on, off, and pairing prompts are sooooooo loud. Definitely feels weird when in a library but easy to over look
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Skyles

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. I use to have a pair of Bose headphones...unfortunately I fell asleep on the couch and one of my cats leaped at this opportunity to chew/ruin them. I was looking for a cheaper option...I've only used them for a little bit now but they seem like they are really good quality and produce a good sound. The noise canceling is really good, but not a 100%...which is fine with me. I kind of want to be able hear a least a little bit noise especially in my house. I like them so much that I am even considering buying another pair to keep at work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are perfect. It works amazingly well with my glasses and ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect. It works amazingly well with my glasses and plugs (stretched ear lobes). It does a great job helping me block out all the other people around me when I am at a coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I bought the patterned FX-Victoria for $27 and then yesterday I got these Mpow for $37. As you can see the Mpow are a little larger and cover the entire adult ear. The sound is better on the Mpow (because it covers entire ear) and the material feels sturdier. Now the FX-Victoria I've had for months and they work great and have no regrets. I'll use the Mpow some more and update later if necessary. But for adults I'd get the Mpow and for kids the FX-VICTORIA.
customer_reviews.author: windy247

customer_reviews.title: Those were.... disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my brother for his work, in an office, on a desk, and that's it, they stayed at work! They sounded alright, don't expect much really, like for music or movies, you could hear what's being said and that's about it. It's made out of plastic, glossy cheap plastic, it's not the heaviest, but that's not the worst part. The ear coshins broke off after barely two months, rendering the headphones useless of course! My mom was able to recover them and fix the ear-pads/coshins, but yeah... would not really buy again! :\
customer_reviews.author: iBoolGuy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These don’t claim to be “noise canceling” but I could almost believe they were. The foam pad around the ear does a great job of blocking exterior sound. Sound quality is great. Product quality has been great. Battery life has been great. The plug in wire came in handy when I arrived at the gym and found the battery was dead due to me not plugging them in all the way when I had went to charge them. That hard wire is great to plug in when on an airline as well. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: robbrue

customer_reviews.title: *Updated Review* Good Performance. Starting coming apart shortly after warranty period expired
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones for the price. Purchased for teenager to use with phone (who didn't start using regularly until past 7-8 months). The fake leather/fabric on the headband started peeling off a few months ago (just after the warranty expired) and has only gotten worse. Bit of a bummer - hence the 2 star review...otherwise 4-5 star review if they hadn't started coming apart. *Updated rating from 2 stars to 5 stars 5/27/2020* This vendor sent me an unsolicited, new, replacement pair of headphones for the pair we had which (at the time of the initial review) started coming apart just outside the warranty period. Excellent customer service. Very impressed. Recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: GBelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones and use them almost everyday at work! They are large enough so your ears does not hurt, unless you use them for a very extended period of time. The BIG minor flaw is the low battery sound.... it will annoy you every 2 mins or so, telling you the battery is about to die with an annoying noise in your ears interrupting the music. One single time notice would be enough but this keeps making the sound again and again until it dies... fix that and these will be golden!!
customer_reviews.author: RamieBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great heaphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are worth every penny. The ear cushion is so comfortable & fits around my ears. I didn't get them for the noise cancellation however it does a decent job at it. The red color is great, very sleek looking. I walked all the way down my stairs as my computer was sitting on my couch on my 2nd level & I was still able to hear what I was playing very well! I recommend getting these, they are a good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but HEAVY on your head!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and the Bluetooth connectivity also works well, but I simply could not stand it 15 minutes over my head, due to how HEAVY it is. Even after several adjustments on the length of the headband, it applies so much pressure on the top of the head and that really bothered me with a headache and dizziness. I realized it weighs about 11 ounces, while most Bose headphones are between 6-8 ounces. If you’re willing to pay 5 times more for a Bose, maybe that’s where the difference is.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I was so excited about them and satisfied that I wanted to review them right away. Packaging: protective Price: more expensive than basic ear buds, but worth the price! Sound: clear, no fuzzy or static. Silences background noise in the gym for an example. Fit: comfortable and adjustable Glasses: works with mine. Keeps them in place. Movement: head banging makes it move, but as a gym rat, they stay in place for deadlifts, jumping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Such an improvement over the headphones I previously had been using. I work out 4-5 times a week and use them for about three hours every day while commuting and I only have to charge them about once a week. These are super comfy and surprisingly compact when you fold them up. I highly recommend these for anyone who is tired of in ear headphones or anyone who is looking for a great pair of workout head phones. They block out most noises and they’re durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Way too much bass, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how good the reviews are on this one, honestly. I put these on and put on Wretched Weaponry from the NieR Automata soundrack which has pretty much become my benchmark, and it sounded like there was a concert on the opposite end of a sewer tunnel from me. So hollow, booming, overpowering everything else. Could quietly hear mids, and the highs barely broke through as if gasping for air as they tried to keep their head out of the quicksand that was the bass. Also the controls on the side suck. Give these a pass, I'm telling you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fawson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 10 months, then microphone died suddenly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones December 2019. I loved them as they have good bass and feel very comfortable. pros: -connect to multiple devices simultaneously -long battery live -continue to use with cable when battery is dead -easy store bag -some kind of noise cancellation (not mentioned, because it isn't active noise cancellation), but good enough to block external noises cons: -microphone lasted only 10 months, the I can still use it to listen to music, but can't make calls anymore, which is a must during covid (zoom/meet) -synthetic leather is starting to flake off (always put it back in the bag and still) I just hoped the microphone lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave JAL

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: ... and I have a lot of headphones. This set works perfectly for me because they fit tightly on my head (good for brisk walks and passive noise cancellation) and the blue tooth signal is steady. It took me a little while to adjust to how tightly they fit around my ears because I wasn't accustom to it, but after a couple of uses I got to really like them. Good sound quality and volume for my purposes - I'm very happy with this set. And the price... perfect. Who could complain? Oh, by the way, these things hold a charge for a long time and they charge quickly. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: D. Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Best brand out there
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for MONTHS and honest to God they have not died or had to be charged once, the charger for headphones are still in the bag! Great sound quality, noise cancelling and firm in staying in place. A bit heavy to wear around one's neck but really the best Bluetooth headphones out there, have this brand in Bluetooth headphones with the wire and I never had to charge those either and used them many many times without having to charge, no lie! Great purchase~
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Update: not so good
customer_reviews.text: My Beats headphones have worn out, and I could not afford another pair. I found these headphones on Amazon, and after a while of use, you can tell how poor the sound quality is. I did not expect another Beats. But I also did not expect the sound to be so unpleasant. The bass sounds artificial, and it can not handle mid range at all. Try listening to Kacey Musgraves and you will see what I mean about the mid range. I did give it two stars because it is pretty comfortable and pairs well. Comfort is important. But the sound is just as important, and it really lacks in the sound department. I am returning these today.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: These were my first experience with Bluetooth head phones. I bought them primarily to listen to TV to replace a very old wireless but not Bluetooth set that finally fell apart. They worked OK at first. I was not critically evaluating sound quality so can't judge that. The biggest dislike was the one button do everything control with practically no sensory feel out of sight on one earpiece. Pairing worked fine and easy but volume control was marginal for me. Anyway, now after 6 months of occasional use the unit will not hold a charge and cannot be paired any longer. Next try will be more $ and from a hands on local source.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dick31

customer_reviews.title: Works in a pinch, but not quality
customer_reviews.text: I intended this as a cheap travel headset so I was prepared for mediocre sound so long as the mic worked decently. 4 stars on both fronts, no complaints bc I got what I paid for. Giving this 3 stars though for the tight fit - it gives me a pressure headache within 2 hours, and just generally does not feel gentle on the head. I have a medium-large head and specifically search for comfortable sets, and some of the reviews below endorsed this set's comfort. Not for me, oh well. Also the ear cups get too warm, doesn't feel like they can breathe.
customer_reviews.author: HammyBuys

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working....Mpow replaced them
customer_reviews.text: It was great until the left side stopped working after just 6 months. Before I was going to throw them in the trash, I wanted to try and fix them. Unfortunately, they're sealed and can't be taken apart. So I just hit it with my fist a couple of times. VOILA!!! The left channel started to work again. I'm assuming the left channel will go out again, sooner than later.... UPDATE: Mpow contacted me and replaced the headphones. So far the new ones sound fine. GREAT customer service!!! It's nice to work with a professional company that stands by their products.
customer_reviews.author: SDite

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable, but annoyingly loud Bluetooth voice
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding comfortable headphones at a great price. Fit over ears nicely. Good bass tones. My only big complaint is I don't like the voice that talks telling you when the headphones are "pairing" or "disconnected" or "power off" - the voice is really loud and you can't adjust the volume, I find it to be very intrusive and abrasively loud in an otherwise quiet setting when I am using the headphones. Wish I could turn off this feature and just have an led blink to tell me I am connected or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, Recommended
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: YOU CANT USE THIS WITH ANY APP OTHER THAN THE PHONE, MUSIC, OR YOUTUBE APP. AAAAA. The microphone is apparently pretty good. The sound quality is really good...unless you take a call, and then switch back to music. Then you get the call quality for the music, which isnt so hot. They fit really well. I didnt have to adjust or anything. Then again, I've got a small head. And ears. The buttons are kinda...odd? Like, one button does four or five different things. But I guess that's better than ten tiny buttons. I plan on using these for live streaming, so I'll keep yall updated on how well they hold up. And maybe gaming.
customer_reviews.author: starkanthonye

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had initially ordered a product that did not fit correctly for us. We reached out to the company and they were wonderful to deal with and quickly worked out a solution for us. We are very satisfied with the new headphones they provided. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for a few years and they hold a charge FOREVER to this day! Sound is exceptional and they hold up amazingly well. I bought a pair for my son at the same time and through his beating them up, they work perfectly still. He can use them for his music as well as for his game station without the aggravation of a boom mic. They plug in to the hand control and he likes them better than the expensive gaming headphones that broke. Sound and mic quality is WAY better than his gaming set was.The sound quality when using it to answer calls is amazing as well. Would DEFINITELY recommend! LOVE THESE HEADPHONES!!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsierose01

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very cheaply made. The speakers were terrible and had no bass. The mic for the phone did not work at all. Made several different calls and I had to yell into the phone for them to barely make out what I was saying. I’m very unhappy with this product. I just gave it to my kid for toy headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rowland

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a great buy and a great price. They cancel noise, have great sound quality, have an awesome battery life, and a comfortable to wear (I wear mine almost all day without issue). The are compact, as they fold into themselves and have a nice velour carrying bag you can store them in. I've had these for awhile and wear them every day and haven't had any wearing, fraying, or peeling in the material of the headphone cushion, unlike a lot of other similar headphones I've owned. These are also pretty lightweight, which is nice when wearing them around your ears or neck a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my Gamecon headset had great sound quality and were working fine ... they just weren't that comfortable. My daughter had bought a pair of these last year and through trying those out found they were extremely comfortable for longer sessions and had amazing sound quality. So I took a chance and bought these recently. Was not disappointed. I use them on my PC for gaming and listening to music. I paired it with the "Mpow Bluetooth transmitter and receiver, 2-in-1 Wireless 3.5mm Bluetooth Adapter, Bluetootoh Transmitter for TV/PC/iPod, Bluetooth Audio Receiver for Car/Home Stereo System, Built-in Mic & Dual Link" and they connected without any hitches. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laurenti

customer_reviews.title: SECOND HEADPHONES TO LOSE SOUND ON ONE SIDE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my granddaughter for Christmas. After 10 days, the sound stopped working on one side. Two years ago, I purchased the same make and model headphones and the same thing happened after a few months. I've decided not to try for "three's a charm" and will look to replace with a different model. UPDATE - January 16th, 2020: The seller, Patozon graciously shipped another pair of these Mpow headphones to me at no cost which work as expected with no problems. That's what I call a great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Great service !
customer_reviews.text: Update: after posting my previous review the customer service department reached me the next day telling me they're send me a new pair at no cost. The first pair ended up being from a bad batch and the quickly sent me a replacement that do feel better and seem that they'll hold up better as well. Very happy with the service and the headphones! Thank you. At first these were great for what you pay for but it's been just over 4 months with just regular use during running/jogging and now it sounds like the speaker in the right ear has fallen off and it rattles while running. Too annoying to run with. Sad cause I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrika Greva

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, starts to fall off leaving black stuff all over your ear, shoulders and clothes
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy just because many people bought it. Cheap material used. I had to put a covering over the ear because the fake leather started to peel off leaving black flakes all over the house, pillow, blankets, ears, shoulders, and clothes. It's extremely awful. I had this for about 3 months and it started to peel. It's made very very small, for adults it will feel very very tight on your head and ear. Pay more and buy something else. It's not worth it at all. Sound quality sucks too. I have to put the sound up lot higher than the other headset I have recently purchased. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: overall good headphones, bad mic quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Really comfortable and cushiony; it fits really well. The audio quality is surprisingly good for the price and it really cancels out back round noises. The only con is the mic quality. Whenever I try to call someone, they always mention I sound extremely muffled. This was kind of disappointing but not surprising due to the fact it's a built-in mic. Also, if you wear it for extended periods of time, it will hurt your head. The top and sides of my head ache after wearing it for 3+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: andy chow

customer_reviews.title: Annoying blue flashing light. Can’t turn it off.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and work great. I have one significant complaint. You can’t possibly use these in the dark because of an annoying blue flashing light ever few seconds. Bought these for travel but I’ll have to get a different pair so I don’t disturb people around me. Was so pumped about these all day until I went to bed and discovered the issue. After reading other reviews it seems you can’t turn this off.
customer_reviews.author: Alison L

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a parent, you NEED these
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mother to a teenager and 2 littles 2.5 and 11 months. Sometimes I need to hand them over to another adult and not hear them. I had been eyeing a pair of Bose headphones but let’s face it, with 3 kids Bose headphones aren’t in my budget. These are an amazing value and I’ve recommended them to all of my friends. These make it possible to snuggle and comfort a crying baby without having to listen to the crying for 11 straight hours. I never would have made it through the colic days (and nights) without these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flink

customer_reviews.title: Most impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my significant other. She doesn't like earbuds, but wanted wireless. I went back and forth between these and a few other brands. Ultimately, these won out, mostly because of what I'd read in my research, but also because of the color. These things sound incredible! I can't believe the full range! I'm going to say they are good at blocking out noise, because she cannot hear me when she's wearing them (although, it could be a good excuse...LOL!). She loves them, and the case that I bought for them. If I was going to buy over the ear wireless headphones for myself, I would definitely get these...just not in pink!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good value while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These wireless headphones were everything you could ask for in a budget product - great features and value for the money. Unfortunately, I had accidentally stretched these a bit too far removing them from my head with one hand once, and this cracked the top plastic band partially. It was still connected, but with fractured plastic. It looked bad but still worked. Then, some of the foam filling started coming out. Fine. Eventually, I lost these somewhere and didn't care enough to buy another pair - they were bulky anyway. Now I'm onto the wireless earbud fad with the Pamu slides - they are infinitely better as a form factor.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very bad as a headset, but good when used as headphones (stereo mode)
customer_reviews.text: I bought for headset so that is why the bad review. Sound quality and microphone are very poor as a headset, but when used just as headphones they are good for a low price. I had lots of complaints from people I work with on Zoom to the point I had to switch back to my wired headset. My son had the same problem with this headset, but he wanted them mostly for the headphones and did not want to spend more money. I ended up buying a $80 Steelseries Arctis 1 wireless headset instead that is perfect and returned these $35 headset. So if price being lower is crucial this headset might still be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Paden

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: CONS: I’m not an expert on music, nor do I consider myself that picky with headphones, but I know the quality of sound coming out of these was poor. Too much treble perhaps? My last pair of headphones was a $20 pair of skull candies and sound quality was far more satisfying. These had great reviews so I figured I’d upgrade and paid $30 for these... These were also very uncomfortable for me to wear too. I have a smaller head, but it’s not that small. I think they’re too tight laterally actually, so I don’t see how someone with a bigger head could wear them. PROS: Bluetooth, full ear converge, and a nice sleek look. IMO not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rozmarynowycz

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap alternative on Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: So far, i have no problems with the Headphones themselves, just a few minor setbacks and things that could be improved on future releases. *Sound cancellation is bad: even when adjusted and tightened enough, noise from the headphones is kind of loud. This could be bad on a phone call or even while playing music. This can be solved by lowering the volume to mid-low, but who does that? *Media buttons: the buttons make a circle where Up/Down is for volume and Left/Right for Previous/Next Track. However, since they are not separated, you will press right-ish-down/up or up-left-ish often resulting on nothing or anything, but what you wanted to do. Other than this couple of details, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Hayak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this headset! I purchased this set after getting a different brand that were too tight. I put these on and they were comfortable from the first second--no need to break them in or wait for them to stretch out. The sound quality is great and it was easy to set up with my Chromebook. I only wish there was a way to determine how much battery life is left--my MPow bluetooth earbuds will tell me when I turn them on whether the battery is high, medium, or low so I have some type of indication as to how charged up they are. Other than that, these are an excellent headset!
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones mechanically- earmuffs flaking
customer_reviews.text: I had my Bluetooth earphones for almost 2 years and they still work great. I use them to watch TV at night to not disturb others and I have a slight hearing impairment so these make hearing the TV much easier. They have survived my grandchildren using them, being dropped, they have even survived falling asleep with them on. They still hold a good charge that lasts almost 24 hrs. My only complaint is that the memory protein earmuffs started flaking off in the first year. Now they leave flakes on my ears, face, clothes and I cannot find anyway to replace them. I refuse to buy a new earphone because they work great.
customer_reviews.author: txrray

customer_reviews.title: Not enough volume.
customer_reviews.text: Build was ok but the volume was not nearly loud enough. I returned them for a refund. If the volume would’ve been as loud as the lady who tells you you’re at max volume, it would’ve been ok. Very disappointed. My hearing is fine by the way. UPDATE 07MAY2018; I received an email from Bella at Patozon customer service. I’m upgrading to 5 stars because of their customer service. After reading my initial review, they contacted me and sent me a new pair. Not many retailers will do this so I want to give kudos to Bella and her customer service team. Number One!
customer_reviews.author: sailwindtwo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two pair of these. In a year. The first one simply stopped working. I'm not an idiot, but I couldn't fix whatever was wrong. The second pair, which I've had less than a year, still work, but yesterday a piece of the sliding ear adjustment fell off and now I can't adjust the size fit. Nor, after a half hour of trying, can I fit the piece back in. So. No more of these for me. Yes, the sound quality is fine. The construction sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheap but good sound, great range, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: the title says it all. feels like they cost 10 bucks, lousy control feel. BUT comfy enbough for hours, the passive noise reduction is worth about 10dB which is decent, sound quality for general use is great, for music it's acceptable but very lacking in bass and maximum volume, battery life is forever, they pair nearly instantly, they have much much better range than my other bt earphones - like 10-15 feet better, or approx 50%. overall i'm pleased and would buy again for television use but not for music. I expect a wire failure at the two folding hinge points so will likely epoxy them in the open position.
customer_reviews.author: JAFO

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as high end headphones for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.text: I compared these against my co-worker's $200 Beats, and these sound almost as good. The Beats had slightly better bass and fidelity, but for less than a quarter of the cost, I'm not going to complain. They also last for a long time. I just bought a replacement pair after I dropped my first pair in a pile of dog crap. They still worked great after two years of heavy use, I just couldn't get the smell out of the foam cups. The battery life is pretty great too - I only have to recharge these about once a week after using them for 4-6 hours most days.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love that my husband bought this!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I have never used these headphones, but I love them anyway. Why? Because now I can be in the same room with my husband quietly reading a book while he is watching political argument shows I hate, and loud motor revving, car chasing, blow-em-up action movies he loves. If we watch something together, I can turn on the volume on the TV and keep it at a normal level while he can turn up the volume on his headset. (Since its using bluetooth, the headphones doesn't cut off sound to the speakers) No more headaches for me, and happy wife / happy life for him. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Ghislaya

customer_reviews.title: Terrible audio stuttering, constantly have to restart the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish of the headphones is decent, and the sound quality is decent. But wow, these headphones have some of the worst audio stuttering I've ever encountered in a Bluetooth headphone. Broken, stuttering audio if you pause your media for over 3 minutes, forcing you to power cycle the headphones to re-establish a solid connection. Happens consistently, regardless of the battery level. Can't recommend with the frequency of stuttering that occurs. Update: The merchant reached out after seeing this review and sent a replacement headset. The new headset functions much better!
customer_reviews.author: jtf8044

customer_reviews.title: Low cost headphones DELIVER
customer_reviews.text: These cheaper headphones perform better than much more expensive, popular brand ones I've had in the past. They fit over my ears comfortably, are highly adjustable, have a built-in microphone, and are comfortable to wear for long periods while wearing glasses. I've never had a problem with the bluetooth, and they charge fast. I've had these throughout COVID and working from home, using them daily, and they still perform to a high quality as if new. Very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittyn

customer_reviews.title: For the price, the sound quality was good, the final quality of the 059 headphones is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Having the option of wearing headphones for listening to media has been an area for quality conscious people to compare featured and the quality level prior to purchase. All things considered the MPOW 059 headphones are a good purchase, the problem seems to be lack of quality in the item. On the 059 headphones I have the button controlling the audio, stopped working. No volume control means the item in broken. I have used these 059 headphones a good deal but never mishandled, the switch that failed should have been a long term area of success not failure.
customer_reviews.author: RLWarner

customer_reviews.title: Pls rate helpful if it was. My honest review
customer_reviews.text: These are literally just average at best. They were a lot of money for equivalent headphones that sell for $10.00 at stores like Marshall’s and Tj Only giving three stars as they worked and had good battery life and came in a carry case. I would buy a cheaper set as the quality will be the same or buy a better set and be done with cheaper headphones.
customer_reviews.author: SAFARIPOLICE

customer_reviews.title: Great as headphones, not great for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. My only complaint would be, when using these during phone calls, ambient noise is almost amplified! My boyfriend & I have the same sets, & when we talk to one another using them, we have to be in almost silent rooms. Even someone else talking in the room will sound like their mouth is right up to your ear. It's kind of amazing, but in a bad way. If any noise is happening, we have turn the headphones off to talk through our phones. But, aside from that, these really are a great buy. The battery life is awesome, sound quality is great, & I think they're really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stough

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Got them to use primarily at work to listen to music and to use on my VoIP soft phone. Works great for both. Also used it on my PS4 (although you have to plug it in because Playstation doesn't support Bluetooth devices anymore). The battery in these things is awesome. Seems like I rarely ever charge it. They are very comfortable for prolonged use but I will say that sometimes I'll take one ear piece off in case I'm half listening to outside conversations and it can make your other ear sore. Maybe that's just me. But when wearing properly it's super comfortable. Oh and sound quality is great too. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SinSin

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and seeing the number of high ratings, i chose these for my new gym headphones. Positives: Product feels solid, charges quickly and feels good on my head. Battery life is above average. Negatives: Sound quality is consistently poor and changes better or worse with each BlueTooth connection. Bass is ok. Basically what is advertised Treble and Mid-Range is muffled and sounds like echoing from a bucket My old ear buds have better quality but kept falling out of my ears, hence this purchase. Size is bulkier that other but pads are comfortable Over all just not what i expected from the >1000 4.5 star reviews
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 70 days, But ..... Seller Reponds and Makes Good on Warrenty.
customer_reviews.text: As a gift,, the wife loved them.. She used them never outside the home and mostly at bedtime watching videos. Great fit and sound quality. Today they stopped accepting a charge, although they still work well wired, the convenance of wireless is gone.. .....After posting this review the seller sent me another headset. This headset again, is very comfortable and has great sound quality. I have passed this on to my wife as a replacement for the previous gift.. Quality may be suspect or maybe it was just one bad headset and all rest may be great but good to know the seller accepts responsibility and doesn’t hesitate to stand by their products.
customer_reviews.author: fearn0evil

customer_reviews.title: Impressiv sound and features, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily at work ever since my office moved to a more "communal" environment. I am now able to play music just as satisfyingly AND connect to my phone for calls, etc, all wireless. The bluetooth range is great...I don't the exact distance, but I can walk down the hallway to the water cooler that is at least 30-40 feet away and through walls. Comfort: these feel and fit great When i have forgotten to recharge them I can do a quick 10 minute recharge for another couple hours of music. I forget to recharge them sometimes because the battery will last for days. Excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my ears!  Customer Service responded quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Cool headphones but I just wish it weren't made for Mr. Spock ears! These hurt the soft spot below my ears because of the oblong shape. I will return these for ones with round earpieces. UPDATE 01/07/2020: Customer Service reached out to me and expressed their concern that the headphones did not work. They then sent me a brand new pair of (different) headphones that fit more comfortably and even felt a little lighter. I did not expect a response, much less an brand new headset. This is customer service at its finest. I will keep this brand/merchant in the forefront of my mind for future purchases. I am very pleased with the outcome. These guys are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Older Wireless mpow 059 vs new h12
customer_reviews.text: These wireless headphones work. I have had them for years. The padding on the earmuffs started to peal and I wanted actual noise cancellation so I finally decided to buy another set of mpows. My h12 came in and sound a lot better. The only problem is they (The older 059’s) have a sort of a record crackle white noise in the background on quiet songs while listening wirelessly, might be because I’ve had them for a few years. But for the price the sound quality is fine and I refuse to spend hundreds of dollars on headphones... these are great budget headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 3 of these headphones (on May 14, 2018, August 9, 2019, and September 29, 2019). The first one worked well for a year or more, then the Bluetooth stopped working. We bought a second pair, and it only worked for a couple of months, then started beeping, and we were unable to get the beeping to stop. The third pair is still working but who knows when it will fail? When they do work, they provide good sound isolation, are comfortable, and have good sound quality. The Bluetooth connectivity is sometimes erratic to our iPhones and iPad; we have to remove the device and re-pair quite often.
customer_reviews.author: aninonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cheap headphones
customer_reviews.text: I expected a bit more from these headphones, in terms of quality and durability. Yes--They are inexpensive headphones and I didn't expect them to be anything special. However, I could immediately tell that these headphones wouldn't fare well with regular, daily use. The sound quality was good and they were visually appealing. Just the actual build of the headphones felt quite weak though. I knew it would only be a matter of time before they would end up falling apart with repeated use. Not a good investment--at least not for me :/
customer_reviews.author: MikaMaddalena

customer_reviews.title: Needs an auto-off or sleep option
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Very comfortable -Great price -Stylish -Great clear sound -Strong battery life Cons: -Claims to be better than ANC but they aren't at all The biggest con for me is that there is no sleep or auto-off option. I wanted to use these at night in bed to listen to my white noise app thru Bluetooth from my cell phone. What I found out quickly is that because they never turn off, my morning alarm came on thru the headphones that I had thrown off to the floor the night before. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each bought a pair of these MPOW headphones in 2017, they are amazing and still work. Because we love ours so much, and our kids are now teenagers we just bought 6 pairs (one for each of us) we will continue to buy these along the way. I want to point out nothing is wrong with our ones we bought in 2017, we are just going to use those ones for work at our offices.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this set for my 9 year old for her online computer school classes. Having them being wireless makes so much easier because she constantly gets up and down. Having the ability to connect directly is great also. Either way you have headphones that work battery charged or not. I have the same set and i will say that the cushioning over the ear is so soft and form fitting. No sweat issues either. The quality of sound is pretty outstanding. I was not expecting these to be this good because of the price but they are incredible. I have spent a lot more money on other sets but these have beat them out. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ekvall

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Edit.. Changing the rating to 5 stars because of the excellent Customer Serviced Was reached out my their service team to listen to my concerns and was offered a new improved version which has been working fantastically Pros 1) Good Sound 2) Great battery life 3) Comfortable over the ear Cons 1) Cheap material, foam on the step is falling apart 2) Micro USB charging, would have been nice to have USB-C 3) Bluetooth connection is sometimes difficult when switching from Computer to Phone 4) Mic is horrible and just can't be used to take a phone call
customer_reviews.author: Devin Gala

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset for Me
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new headset and trying to figure it out. The biggest gripe I have so far is the small booklet that came with it to help you get it set up and how it works. The writing is SO SMALL, I had to use a MAGNIFYING GLASS to read the booklet. Ok, I now have it synced to my iPhone and it works wonderful. NOW, to try and figure out how to sync it to my laptop --- nothing in the booklet --- sent an email to support at MPOW. Waiting to hear back from them on that issue. In the meantime, I can listen to my music from my iPhone and it sounds GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Creekvue

customer_reviews.title: Love! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these ear phones. We have Apple EarPods, Bose earphones, Sony and multiple earphones and earbuds. None of them come close to these. The sound is great, the noise cancellation is ok, the newer models are supposed to have this feature. The battery last for days. I love that I can switch to another song, restart a song or even go back to a previous song. There is also volume control. I love these so much that I’ve told everyone about them. I’m buying a another for my husband. Save your money, buy these instead of the expensive ones, they work better and in some cases, have more features.
customer_reviews.author: JustUs

customer_reviews.title: Loud, clear, great bass!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome! They sound crisp with very good bass, and I've never had to max the volume. This is my second pair. I had the first pair randomly stop playing after 3 years of very heavy use. I won't pay $200 for headphones. These are so affordable. Also, I've skied outside with these over my hat and facemask. Even in below zero and through 2 layers of headwear they sound great. I was surprised at how well the battery holds up, even in below zero weather! My only problem with them is when it's really hot outside, my ears get kind of sweaty, but that's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: John Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Great sound as headphones, inadequate mic for headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to act as a headset for Skype meetings via PC and my iPhone; while the sound through the speakers was phenomenal, the mic quality was lackluster (which appears to be the norm for non-boom mic headsets). I returned them the same day I got them after I tested the mic quality. To be fair, as headphones alone, they appear to be really nice... rich bass and great sound quality. If I decide to buy a pair of headphones for listening only, I will definitely consider these, but NOT as a headset option.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones and great price (but not noise cancelling)
customer_reviews.text: Great for listening to music or other sound activities. Very comfortable, can wear them for hours and still feels fine. The adjustable sides are great and you can go wireless or use the wire if you need to. The wire/charging cable are both great quality. Comes with a nice fabric case too. Affordable too, compared to other fancier headphones. Only thing is, they're not noise cancelling if that's what you're looking for, but they do drone out most noise. If you're looking to hush your loud neighbors without having to blast your music, maybe consider something else. But if you're just looking for music headphones, these are a good fit with great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: WangChung

customer_reviews.title: Works well when wired and over bluetooth. Build quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well when wired and over bluetooth. Build quality cheap (ugly shiny plastic). My biggest gripe is the flashing blue light over bluetooth. When connected to bluetooth, a blue LED will shine from one of the sides every few seconds. It stands out a lot and there is no way to disable it except for disconnecting from bluetooth. If I had known about this before, I wouldn't have purchased these headphones. EDIT: I forgot to mention that the microphone is atrocious. I've tried answering calls while outside. Just the slightest breeze will drown out the sound for the person on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: William Gee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they looked good. The price kind of scared me because, usually you get what you pay for. Oh my gosh, I love these headphones. I have a small head and they fit me perfectly , (I have a peanut head). The ear muffs cover my ears very comfortably and stay put. Programing is so easy, it talks you through the process. The sound is great all around. Battery life is awesome. Overall, I really got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: JacquieT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these headphones. Sadly, we have tried everything to sync the sound to the TV but it is still ahead of the TV. Very hard to watch when lips and words are out of sync. We called customer service but they couldn’t help and then they just hung up. We will keep working with these for a day or so, but if we can’t resolve the problem they will have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

product_meta.title: Mpow 059 Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, Hi-Fi Stereo Wireless Headset, Foldable, Soft Memory-Protein Earmuffs, w/Built-in Mic Wired Mode, for Online Class, Home Office, PC/Cell Phones/TV
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Deep

Advanced Compatibility

The Bluetooth V4.1 headset can easily and quickly compatible with smartphones, tablets, TVs and other Bluetooth enabled music devices within 33ft (10m) range, bringing you crystal clear sound effect.

PLEASE make sure the driver software of receive adapter is fully updated when connected to PC or laptop, and you need a SEPARATE Bluetooth adapter when connected with TV.

Foldable and Portable Design

A swivel folding design makes it easy to store them when not in use or during travels.

The stainless steel slider headband allows you to find the perfect fit and provide excellent durability.

The earmuff swivel flat to slip easily into a suitcase or bag. Take it with you anytime anywhere.

Dual Modes

With a built-in 420mAh battery which provides 20-25 hours’ continuous wireless playback, this wireless headset is perfect for riding, jogging or other sports.

In addition, if the battery is low, this product can be used as wired headphone after connecting with an audio cable. Therefore, you can easily switch the modes according to your needs.

NOTE：In hot summer, please take off the headphone every 1-2 hrs to get your ears to relax, in order to get better hearing enjoyment, and keep the head comfortable.

SPECIFICATION

Bluetooth Version: 4.1

Range: 33 feet (10 meters)

Music/Talking Time: 20-25 hrs

Charging Time: 4 hours

Charging Voltage: 5V

Battery Capacity: 420mAh

PACKING LIST

1x Mpow Bluetooth Headset

1x 3.5mm Audio Cable

1x USB Charging Cable

1x Packing Bag

1x User Manual
feature_bullets: IMPRESSIVE SOUND QUALITY IS THE ULTIMATE GOAL: The High-fidelity stereo sound benefits from the 40mm neodymium driver, CSR chip, and the around-ear cushion design which provide a well-closed and immersed enviroment for your ears, Just lose yourself in the music! NOTE: Mpow 059 headphones is passive noise isolating, NOT active noise cancellation(ANC), it can't cancel the noise completely but it won't drain the battery and damage the sound. 2. The closed-back design provides immersive Hi-Fi sound with CSR chip and 40mm driver together, it is better than ANC in term of sounds quality.

BUILT TO STAY COMFORTABLE: The Memory-protein ear cushion simulate human skin texture, ensuring lasting comfort. The stainless steel slider and softly padded headband allows you to find the perfect fit without constraint and provide excellent durability.

NEVER POWER OFF, BOTH WIRELESS & WIRED: 1. The wireless mode: Battery update to 20-hr music time/ talking time in a single charge. A 10-minute charge gives 2 hours of play when battery is low. 2. The Wired mode: you can also use it as a wired headphone with the provided audio cable so the headphones will never power off.

HANDS-FREE CALL & BUILT-IN MIC: Please Note: The Microphone only works in the wireless mode. Mpow Bluetooth headphones provide a quick and stable connection with your Bluetooth enabled devices like cell phones, tablets, pc, TVs within 33 feet, with a high-quality built-in microphone for hands-free calls.

FOLDABLE DESIGN WITH A PORTABLE BAG & GENTLE REMINDER: The foldable Headband is not only designed for saving your desk space but for carrying in the provided bag. Gentle Reminder: Depending on your head/ear size/shape, it may be a little tight(feels like"on ear") for someone to wear which is designed to avoid sound leakage. In case of that and to get both audio and wearing comfort, please take off the headphone every 1-2 hrs to get your ears relax and protect them from muggy environment in use
